page.title: 01My dad's milk round.
page.content: { When my Dad{delivers milk}it takes him about eight hours to deliver to {Horsham, Broadbridge Heath, Southwater and the surrounding countryside. In the summer he has to hurry because the milk goes sour quickly. I sometimes go out with my Dad and I deliver about{200 pints a day,}if he is a good mood. On the van he carries about 700 pints, sometimes more. It is a Ford Transit. In the front he has a wooden box which I have to sit on. In the box he keeps eggs. Dad also carries bread, potatoes and if asked can supply cream,butter and some meats. At the back of the van he keeps fruit juices and fizzy drinks. Dad gets the milk from{Horsham Dairy but it originally comes from{Brighton.
